channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control

item.title: CVE-2024-21191|2024-10-16T14:46:43.432Z -- oracle%20corporation -- oracle%20enterprise%20manager%20fusion%20middleware%20control
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: FMW Control Plugin). The supported version that is affected is 12.2.1.4.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control, attacks may significantly impact additional products (scope change). Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control accessible data as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Enterprise Manager Fusion Middleware Control accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.6 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:L/A:N).
